name: Cross Digits
description:
Are you a number crossword puzzle expert?

Cross Digits is the crossword app where each word is a number. There are no hints; just your own skills of logic and deduction.

GAMEPLAY
Your objective: Fill the board with the correct numbers. Press the Check button when you’re sure about your choices.
• The board starts with some numbers filled in for you
• Reference the word list for numbers that cross the board, horizontally or vertically.
• Example: Tap the 5 to see all 5-digit numbers in the puzzle
• Place entire numbers or individual digits as you solve the puzzle
• Check the final board for victory!

FEATURES
Cross Digits doesn’t waste your time with useless “features”; it just works.
• Over 150 unique puzzles
• 4 difficulties - from Easy to Expert
• No subscription & no ads!

ARE YOU AN EXPERT?
To complete an Expert puzzle takes serious smarts. See if you can get a perfect score!
• Each number is extremely similar
• Only one number given on the board
• Every puzzle can be solved!

*** Need to try before you buy? Download Cross Digits Lite for 4 free puzzles. ***
